PRIVATE_CONFIG_FILE.description: JSON file to load configuration from. Options in the config file override environment variables. Private config only.

PUBLIC_CONFIG_FILE.description: JSON file to load configuration from. Options in the config file override environment variables. Public config only.

PORT.description: Port to serve the backend on

COOKIE_SECRET.description: Secret key used to sign cookies

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret key used to sign JWT tokens

POSTGRES_CONNECTION_STRING.description: PostgreSQL connection string WITH the database name

OPENAI_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of OpenAI API endpoint

EMAIL_TRANSPORT_CONFIG_JSON.description: Configuration for the email client as JSON representing the argument passed to nodemailer.createTransport(). See https://nodemailer.com/usage

EMAIL_FROM_ADDRESS.description: Email addres from which login emails are sent

SITE_TITLE.description: Title of the site (in the browser tab)

LOGIN_PAGE_TITLE.description: Content of the main heading on the login page

LOGIN_PAGE_SUBTITLE.description: Content of the secondary heading on the login page

DISABLE_AUTH.description: [UNSAFE] Completely disables all authentication and runs the app in single-user mode

CHAT_MODELS_FILTER_REGEX.description: Filter to apply to model list from OpenAI API

TITLE_GENERATION_PROMPT.value:
You are going to generate a brief chat title for a new chat with an AI
assistant. Include one emoji at the start of the title. Here are some examples:

- ⛈️ Weather forecast this week
- 👔 How to tie a tie
- ✈️ Cool facts about airplanes
- 👋 Friendly greeting

Ensure the title is a summary of the chat message, and make sure it is as
accurate as possible, without anything made-up or inferred about the message.

THEME_ACCENT_COLOR.description: Default accent color to use throughout the UI. Choose a color from https://www.radix-ui.com/colors

DISABLE_USER_SET_THEME_ACCENT_COLOR.description: Prevent users from choosing their own accent color (sorry, but you are lame if you enable this)
